text: This place is the real deal. Awesome fried chicken and burgers. Very affordable pricing, good portions and fast service. Need to try their ribs next time.
Food is always fresh and taste homemade! Great price and good service. Our new quick favorite!
Great food and service. Go there all the time. Service is excellent and if you have any requests they're happy to help
Ordered fried chicken and portions were dry, hard and chewy!!!! Fries were good. Won't be back

Who wants some fried chicken?!? I'm not much of a fried chicken person but I totally recommend this spot if you are looking for some good fried chicken this side of the valley.  We were in the area looking for a spot to eat to pass time while the teenager's phone was getting fixed and thankfully, Yelp led us here. 

The shop is located on Pecos and Sunset and was pretty easy to find. As soon as we walked in, the gentleman greeted us right away. Luckily, I already skimmed the menu on our way down, so we knew exactly what to get.  We decided to go with the Family Pack (cause well, I have a big family and my family can eat lol). The family pack comes with 18 pieces of chicken, 3 sides, and bread. The husband also decided to sneak in an order of shrimp as well. This was definitely enough for my family of six. 

So I'm a white meat kind of person and the husband gave me the breast right away. All I can say is that the chicken was moist and juicy and the skin had a nice crisp. Breast meat can be a bit more on the drier side, but not this one. It was juicy and seasoned well. Another plus is that the skin had such an amazing crisp to it.  I normally don't eat the skin, but this one...it was heaven! I love how the skin didn't have that oil taste in it.  The chicken was cooked perfectly. Their onion rings are pretty amazing as well. I liked how the entire onion didn't come out in my initial bite like other places. 

Overall, I would recommend this place for some good fried chicken. They do offer other items like hamburgers, ribs, seafood, etc. if you're not in the mood for chicken. Or just stick with the chicken, you won't regret it.

This chicken was AMAZING. Oh man, it is so delicious. Hot, fresh, and the service was very good. They were very nice, and even threw in a couple extra tenders. The ranch was also very good with the chicken. Mmm! Will definitely be returning very soon, and recommending to everyone I know!
Brings me back to my college days. This food is reasonably priced and tasty. If I was a local I'd be eating here whenever I wanted a quick bite.

This place deserves 5-stars for overall service, quality, ease of ordering, the fact that it came from NYC/east coast is enough for me!! The value for the awesome food is superb!! Yes fried food is not what you want day in day out, but if you want some awesome Fried Chicken, mozzarella sticks, fries, gyros, Philly cheesesteaks!! The list goes on and on... this is your place!! Totally not overpriced like other locations!! Locals will definitely not be disappointed! My new spot for 'Halal', will not be going to any other for the same type but better quality food!

This has got to the best place ever. Everytime my husband and I go there  we feel right at home. There is no shame in my game, I eat it like I would eat at home. If you are reading this post please go and try it, don't take my word. Everything is so good. Fish, chicken and oh my goodness the Burgers, that's all I can say is the burgers. Just try for yourself and you'll see what I'm talking about.
It's good stuff, what more can you say, the deals here are excellent, you can feed an army with the 30.00 family chicken meal. I'll be coming here again.

Probably my favorite Philly cheesesteak place. I'm not a huge fried chicken fan, but even I eat the chicken here. Undoubtedly though best part is there wings, they are perfect. Bonus that the customer service is always great even when they are really rushed. Can't wait to go back again!
Amazing chicken, owner is extremely nice and the food was amazing. Reminds me of the east coast. So glad they're branching out here, will be back again for sure.

Holy crap.  This place is amazing.  Been craving it ever since we went.  Got popcorn chicken & mac and both items were off the charts delicious.  I've had a lot of fried chicken since moving to Vegas but I think this place has the best fried chicken in the area.

Came here last weekend, let me first start my rating at 3 stars alone for the service. They were very very friendly, if you have never been here before they let you taste the chicken prior to making a purchase. The next 2 stars come for the quality and just how tasty and juicy the chicken was! I can not wait to make another visit. I hope they are here to stay.

We have only had fried chicken here , but it is the best fried chicken I have had in awhile , and I have tried fried chicken all over in this part of town south of the airport.  Friendly people working and cooking here. This place could move to 5 starts after i try a few more items on their menu.

Not sure what all the hype is about this place. Chicken was OK and service was not that good. Macaroni salad was not good and chicken didn't taste fresh. I have certainly had better. Hard to find good fried chicken here in Vegas lol!
I am from South Africa.A friend recommended the place.The food was amazing.Went back the next day to try Hamburgers and it was also great.

I find it just a little fiendish that this place opened up right next to my work just when I was telling a coworker that I had been craving fried chicken. Said coworker pulled up the menu and we decided to order lunch there for the whole office. 

Everyone loved the chicken. So much so that we've ordered there twice more for lunch on our Fridays. We always get the 21 piece mix. It's more than enough for the 10 or so people in our office but there's never leftovers. 

Even though they're always busy when we go, we never have to wait too long for our order. The service is top notch. One of my coworkers goes there now at least three times a week.

I love it and we will keep ordering from them.

U.S Fried Chicken Halal For The Win! If you like your chicken moist, juicy, with crispy golden skin, then check out this new place!  It's right on the NE corner Sunset and Pecos.  Easy access parking in front and around the corner of the restaurant.

So why five stars off the bat: Because I came here two days in row!  I hardly do that! But really, here's 5 reasons.

1. Tastes Great!
Like I said above, moist, juicy, crispy and flavorful!  Spiced just right. Made to order. Consistent too! The two visits here and the 3 different orders of chicken were all made good!  Other places Ive been to, you've seen my reviews..problems with consistency.  Not here. Passed with flying colors!

2. Very Affordable!
2 pieces of chicken (Your choice of dark or white or mix) fries, soda $6.80!  Many menu items for an individual under ten bucks.  A family of 4 average  under $30.  So 5 stars for that!

3. Nicely rounded menu!
Chicken is their forte, but there's also burgers, beef ribs, seafood, gyros and Philly Cheese Steaks too! WOW!

4. I repeat...pretty inexpensive.
Five dollars for a double cheeseburger with fries....and the one I saw a customer ordered was a good sized one too.

5. Great atmosphere!
Family friendly, and just overall nice. Employees are very welcoming and genuinely friendly and truly appreciative for your business. The place is clean as well.

Fast/casual style...meaning you place and pay for your meal first.  If dining in, there's plenty of tables and 2 high tops. They'll call your name when your order is ready.

Orders came out pretty quick...so perfect place for those who work in the immediate area to grab lunch.

Their hours of operation are pretty convenient. Open seven days  week and open late evenings is a plus!

Just overall very good experience, and like other reviewers stated, best tasting fried chicken for this area, I agree!!

Why yes, I'll go to New York around the corner.  

Went at late dinner hour on week night.  Not busy at all.   Place is clean.  Greeted as I walked in.  Asked if my first time. Offered a sample wing.  

I had read the Cheesesteak review and since he offered me the tasty wing sample.  I decided to get a cheesesteak combo.  He asked if to go, but I like my food hot and fresh.  So dined in.  Friendly, helpful.  Explained where things were, asked if everything was good.  Thanked me for coming in.  
Food was hot and fresh.   Bun was quality and fresh. I will be returning to try more things.

This place is fire! I got the chicken gyro over rice. It comes with a pita or naan bread whichever it was, mine stayed soft the whole day even when I microwaved it. Because you know when bread gets microwaved sometimes it hardens, but no mine stayed soft! It was one of the best flavored chicken I have tried. Try it with the sauce, it's hella good. I actually wanna go back for more very soon. My boyfriend got the philly cheese steak sandwich and his sandwich was HUGE. It was very tasty and flavorful!!! Definitely coming back to taste more on their menu.
Great boasted chicken. Salads are big and staff is great. We had made this a regular stop. Delivery available.

Absolutely amazing! We came in today, finally after many recommendations from yelp reviews and after book marking this place. 
We were helped immediately and were given samples as soon as they found out that it was our first time at their establishment. We were sold at first bite!
The gentleman who helped us was very attentive and polite. He called me "Mam" and made sure we have what we needed. He was patient and gave us good recommendations as first time guests. 
The food was made fresh, delivered to us hot, and the taste was sooo flavorful and delicious. I have a lot of family who visit from out of state and this is one of the places that I will brag about to them and take them to. 
We ordered two sides with the chicken, the Coleslaw and Potato salad were both heavenly. I recommend those too. 
This place has now become one of my favorite places to have chicken. Well recommend place to all! Two thumbs up!
Wasn't a fan ordered potato salad it was very watery and smelt bad. Chicken disgusted me seemed very cheap and undercooked I literally threw everything away. Only good thing was french fries.

Fresh, perfectly prepared fried chicken and sides, served up by the most friendly guys you'll meet. Chicken pieces are huge. Prices comparable with chain chicken joints. They also have a huge menu of sandwiches and other stuff.

I have been on a quest for really really good fried chicken for sometime now.  I have visited Strip Restaurants, Downtown Restaurants and everything in between!  I read about U.S Fried Chicken Halal here on Yelp - and saw the great reviews.  I had to try it out for myself to see what all the fuss was about.

Upon entering we were promptly greeted and welcomed by the owner.  He asked if it was our first time and explained the menu.  He even provided us with a couple of samples!

I settled on the five piece meal with roll and side, and my brother chose the boneless spicy wings.  I tell you what..my fried chicken quest has ended.  Lightly breaded, juicy, seasoned perfectly and non greasy my chicken was insanely good!  The wings packed a punch and were really good.

They have other food options as well, but I would try the fried chicken first.  It took me back to family fried chicken dinners of my youth - that's definitely my highest bar to meet.

Clean, orderly restaurant, friendly, helpful counter staff and the best chicken in town make this the place to be!  

You'll be glad you visited
Food is good. Reminds me of my chicken places in NJ.  The whitting fish was really good, hard to find in Las Vegas.

Finally something different when serving halal food. I personally have been tired of seeing the same halal restaurants/fast food serve the usual 'mediterranean' food consisted of kabob and rice. I was really surprised to see the variety of options on the menu and really couldn't decided of what I was feeling unlike other halal restaurants with limited choices. This is definitely a family friendly spot and I recommend it to everyone. The food is affordable and portions are quite BIG and filling. I really enjoyed the service and felt welcomed and cared for. Abdul was always checking up on us quite a few times. Surprisingly I never experienced the constant hospitality that he has given us in other places. Overall, I'll be looking forward to coming to this place again.
Their chicken is actually really good!! My homies had me check it out and it's definitely worth a repeat!
Their burgers are great! Fried is is awesome, this is a must-go place if you are looking for a good American halal alternative.

We tried this place out for dinner on a Tuesday evening. There were only a few other customers, so we got quick and friendly service.

We were offered a couple of fried wings while we checked out their menu. Nice touch.

The Pros: The fried chicken is SUPER DELICIOUS and reasonably priced. 

The Cons: The restaurant itself is not a comfortable place to eat at. While maybe not overwhelmingly filthy in any specific way, it just comes off as feeling fairly uncomfortable.

So, we experienced delicious fried chicken, but we won't be back unfortunately. There are plenty of places with delicious fried chicken that are also nice places to eat at.
Fire quality food! 8 pcs value pack good for 2 people. Will be back to try other menu items! It's Halal good

Stopped by on a whim for lunch.  Fried chicken, gyros, and a cheese-steak were had by my party.  Everything was delicious!  The facility was clean and the service was amazing, especially for a counter order restaurant.
This is some of the best fried chicken in Las Vegas period!!!!!!! PLEASE GO SEE THEM!

Very tasty food and super nice, friendly owners. I can't wait to come back; maybe tomorrow. The chicken and fish is seasoned well, large portions and I'm from New Orleans and Atlanta. Really enjoyed it all.

Omg their food
Halal, amazing and so cheap!! Seriously, almost as cheap as McD's and a million times better.  Fresh and delicious. We were in Vegas for a weekend and went there 3times in 2 days. We ordered our food to go, it was ready to pick in 15minutes. Loved their cheeseburgers and chicken sandwich too, as well as their wings. Everything was delicious, service was friendly, restaurant was clean and spacious but not super busy. Give them your business, they deserve it!!
Super friendly staff! And an affordable menu with good variety :) They even gave me free fried chicken while I waited!

Game changer over here.  It's weird how you take for granted all the good things in life.   This includes really great halal style food and fried chicken from the east coast.   The gyros over rice, halal fried chicken, and more:  It all makes me salivate just reminiscing about it.   

The food here should leave you satisfied and full!   The portions were plentiful and the value is spot on.  The taste mimics some of the best shops back in NYC.  

My family and I walked in for the first time tonight and were warmly greeted by the staff.  We were offered a sample of their fried chicken before even ordering anything on the menu and that's some exceptional service right there.  The chicken is juicy and moist on the inside and has deliciously spiced crispy skin on the exterior.  

We opted for a 2-piece chicken combo with a roll and a side of mashed potatoes, a chicken gyro over rice plate, a beef gyro salad, and some chicken nuggets for the littles one.   Man, oh man.  We stuffed our stomachs and still had to box it all up for another meal or two at home.  

I wish I could truly express how happy I am to have a better gyro option nearby to me.  I'll probably end up making a stop here a couple times a month for sure.   

Definitely treat yourself to a beef or chicken gyro over rice if you are unsure of what to order.   It may be the best halal-style food you can consume on this side of the country!

Delicious. Simply delicious. Loved the fried chicken, fried shrimp, fries and slaw we ordered. Nothing was too greasy even though it was fried. I definitely recommend this place if you need a fried chicken fix.
Great chicken, they are right,  staff is very nice.  I would go back it's small but it was not crowded so service was good

Upon entering, my friend and I were greeted by two of the workers, and was offered a piece of chicken to taste before making a decision on what to order. 

The fried chicken was pretty good. Not too greasy, and had delicious flavour. I opted to get the spicy chicken wings with fries and a Hawaiian roll. The spicy chicken wings weren't spicy at all, but you can kind of taste it in there. Not a problem for me though, because I enjoyed the taste of their fried chicken. The fries are also nice too, thin cut fries.

The restaurant was small but clean. I appreciated the generous sample. Great service, decent price, and great fried chicken!

I don't ever feel guilty when eating the fried chicken here! It's non-greasy (less need to finger lick), superbly flavorful, lightly crispy, and incredibly succulent, so much so, that I ended up becoming a regular customer after the first visit. :) Service is impeccably polite and generous (sometimes, you may find a free, extra chicken piece in your takeout), and other items on the menu are made to order. I've warmed up their fried chicken in my toaster oven for breakfast, and it still tasted as good as the day before! I've also tried their chicken wings (original is better than the 'hot'), cheese-steak hoagie (excellent meat to bread ratio), bbq beef ribs (amazingly tender), chicken nuggets (way better than McD's), hamburger (freshly cooked, sizeable ground beef patty that I believe surpasses even In n Out!), and tilapia-whiting (delicious fish fry). It's been well worth the 20 minute drive for me to keep coming back. The menu offers plenty of variety with something for everyone (unless you're a pork-eater, no pork here, sorry!). The prices are less expensive for terrific food quality that equals or easily exceeds other comparable eateries, and the wait usually isn't very long before they have your meal ready.  Give U.S. Fried Chicken Halal a try, and I think you'll probably return for more than just their chicken! :D
Great Fried Chicken and Gyro. The place not fancy, but very clean and the stuff is very friendly. I will definitely come back again.

Update on the wings: Whohoo! The wings are awesome. So glad there's a legit wings shop I can go for lunch now. Priced reasonably at about $15 bucks for 12 wings with fries and soda, I'm a fan. These Halal friend chicken wings are definitely worth trying.

The 2 piece and 3 piece fried chicken meals are an excellent value.  The breading is well seasoned and the chicken is moist including the breast meat.  The fries are thin and crispy and the onion rings are crispy also.  If you like potato salad on the sweet side then you will enjoy the balance of the vinegar and sweetness in the potato salad.

Abdul was friendly and check to see if needed anything multiple times.  A new batch of chicken is worth the 15 minute wait.

The restaurant is clean and you can view the cooking of the chicken in the enclosed frying vats.  Recommended for family dining.

The meals are also served with King's Hawaiian sweet rolls.

I would definitely recommend U S Fried Chicken Halal!

Bomb chicken!! I can't wait to get home to review this place so I am reviewing it now as we are dining in. I ordered off grub hub for a pick up/to go order. I had a taste for fried chicken and didn't know where to get any that would be good locally, so I decided to try this place based off the reviews. The food smelled great and I was pretty hungry so my daughters and I had to sit down and eat before going home. The employee who rang me up was very friendly and brought me the food covered with foil in a pan (I ordered 9 piece fried chicken and a side of fries.. costing approx $15 and they also have grub hub coupons for $10 off by the way). When I let him know we would be staying to dine in he brought me plates and forks and napkins right away as well as their sauces (ketchup standard buffalo and ranch) so I didn't use my to go ones he packed for us. The chicken was delish! Fresh & crispy! My daughters loved the shoestring fries and the chicken. They seemed happy the kids liked it so much and asked me if they did. (Incase they didn't notice my 3 and half year old scarfing down fries and 2 pieces of chicken) even the baby ate the food & im sure they'll eat more later. We had plenty of leftovers to bring home as well. As soon as customers left they cleaned the table immediately. Employees had gloves on and the place is pretty clean. The floors did have some scuffs and dirt marks tracked on them but that's probably normal from customers throughout the day, I did show up in the evening. I asked for water cups and was given some. Don't waste your money on crap like KFC. Come here for friendly and attentive service and good crispy fried chicken!

If you're from NY you'll Love this Place!!!! Came here off a Recommendation of a friend. My husband is from Queens he says this place Definitely reminds him of back Home!!!! The food is Reasonably priced. We had the Whiting Fish and Fries. Excellent Customer Service!!! They also threw in a few extra pieces of fish! I'll Definitely be Back!!!

Very friendly service, probably trying to make a name for themselves. I had their chicken wings and it was pretty good. It was really moist and they give you a whole wing. This probably would taste really good with one of Buffalo Wild Wings seasonings. I would compare this place to Chicken Shack who both had good wings.
Wow...I truly enjoyed this restaurant...Great customer service and great food...I will definitely be going back and Yes its Halal
This was hands down the best fried chicken I've had in Las Vegas. My brother had a double cheeseburger and said "it's too pure for this world". We will definitely be coming back!

Excellent Broasted chicken, excellent gyros.
Priced reasonably, clean and friendly service.
Wonderfully delicious!! Great services and would recommend this to anyone looking for good fried chicken, Good Fried Chicken! Just had some tonight.

My boyfriend and I tried this place the other day and  we thought it was fantastic.  We both had the three piece chicken with fries.  The food was delicious!  We will definitely be back again.  I enjoyed the meal and the owners were very kind.

I drove 45 minutes specifically to come here based on the Yelp reviews. Regrettably, I was not impressed.  When I walked in, a man (presumably the owner) greeted me. He reviewed my options and we settled for an 8 piece value pack. However, the value pack still cost me $18 and that is with no drinks included. I found that to be way overpriced.  In any case, I asked if the chicken was fresh and the man told me that they just took it out of the fryer/oven.  While waiting for them to prepare my meal, I noticed the menu board. The menu board looked like it was from 1980. I couldn't believe a new restaurant has such an old menu board. A few minutes later, the food was brought to our table.  I started out and tried the potato wedges. They were delicious! Next I tried the onion rings. They were ok!  Finally I took a chicken leg and bit into it. Ugh. The breading tasted burnt/smoky. I finished out that piece and tried another one. Same thing, it tasted burnt. The perplexing thing is that the chicken didn't look burnt.  I had about 3 pieces and my wife had 1  Finally when we were leaving, I was asked how things were and I told the man about my experience. He apologized and said that next time it would be better. I'm not sure if there will be a next time. As I said, the prices were very high and the food wasn't that good.  When I came home, I ate the rest of the chicken and surprisingly, it tasted a little better.  Too bad, I really wished that this place would have been a hit because it would have a been a great place to go to when I'm in the area.
Went in here with low expectations, guy actually gave me a whole leg to sample. Very nice fried chicken and good value so moving to a 4 vs a 3 as there are no half stars, will go back.
So much yassss! I had wings with Mac and cheese and wasn't disappointed. My hubby had the gyro and said it was the best he's had in town. Definitely coming back for their crack wings.
Really good chicken, really fast service, really friendly folks, and a wide variety of menu items.  First time today, won't be the last.

Decided to try something new last night with the boyfriend, checked out US chicken. The cashier asked if we been here before and it was our first time and he gave us free samples of the fried chicken ( crispy and light) was so good we decided to get the hot wings , fries and Mozzarella sticks. Brought out ketchup and cucumber ranch sauce that was ridiculously good with our chicken. The guy that cooked it even came out and asked if everything was okay. It's not a fancy place you get paper plates and some napkins the menu is chicken , gyros and burgers also fish and chips pretty simple but the service here is great Very humble.  Good chicken and good vibes. Very happy we checked it out.

Me and my brothers were in town on a long layover and found this GEM. Amazing food at a great price. Burgers, ribs, wings and fried chicken. I highly recommend this place, Really enjoyed it we'll be back any chance we get.

I really wanted to like this place since we have a ton of them back east and the food is usually good but that was not the case here. The staff was friendly and helpful. I was offered a piece of chicken to try which I thought would be good since they really want you to try it and it was average at best. I've had much better at Smith's smh. So I steered clear of the chicken and gave the fried whiting and shrimp a try. Both were decent but everything including the fries just tasted like old oil that should've been thrown out a while ago. Also I don't know why one meal came with a dinner roll and the other didn't. I looked at the dessert (mostly cake) and it looked hacked up. Seriously who doesn't know how to slice a cake. Sorry but little things like that matter to me, presentation is always key. I wish my experience here was better cause it's close to my home but I doubt I'll ever return.

My new spot for super crispy chicken! The Philly was amazing!! Great bread and the meat and cheese ratio was on point!! Oh and dont get me started on the beef ribs! Absolutley fantastic! Melt in your mouth ribs! Thanks to Abdul and his co-workers we will be making weekly trips! Great place!

This is the best chicken place on earth! My co-workers and I started coming to this place about 2 months ago and we've been addicted every since! We come here at least 3 times a week. The price is great and the gentleman there are AWESOME!! I would recommend this place to anyone! Trust me, YOU'LL LOVE IT!!Dont go on the bad reviews people put it in i personally believe they are nicest gentlemen i have ever met.

I ordered a cheese steak.. as I do so many other places, which end up being terrible, this is the first time in years I've found a truly delectable cheese steak sandwich which was delicious! 
On top of that, the chicken skin was crunchy without being oily, the mozzarella sticks were exceptional, and above all that? The service was amazing. I'll be back as part of my new pre and or post movie ritual!!
Been twice in 5 days and it gets better!! Always fresh! Always kind!!!you got tetra try it!!!!!!

This joint is crazy!!! Right when we walked in, they handed us a sample. I already knew I was gonna like this place. Their chicken is tasty n juicy but not oily. There's lots of choices to choose from but nothing is over complicated. Great value and great food! Definitely coming back.

Chicken is so good!  I ordered a chicken sandwich $2.99 !!! And it was fresh breast meat.  I ordered the spicy it was so good!  I also ordered the prawns and fries and they were great as well.  Prices are good and the service was great.  The counter guy offered me a drumstick while I waited for my order.  I will definitely be returning!!  Frequently

Our niece told us about this place, so we decided to check it out. Was pleasantly surprised they have so much more than chicken. I had the Gyro , I had ordered extra sauce on the side because I like a lot of sauce , but didn't need it . Very messy because it was so big and juicy but absolutely delicious ! My husband had the Philly Cheese steak and he loved it. While we were waiting for our order we told them our niece had tried their chicken and was pleased that it wasn't greasy so they gave us a couple of wings to try . Very good , very crispy and not greasy at all. They were out of the Mac&cheese  and I wish they had mashed potatoes and gravy to go with the chicken but we will definitely be going back.

Seriously yummy!! The spicing of the batter is spot on and not too salty, chicken juicy and not super greasy (my plate wasn't covered in pools of oil), the wedges are amazing!! The ribs are a bit spicy but super tender and lots of sauce.  Definitely coming back

This place is absolutely amazing. The staff were very friendly and helpful. We were given free buffalo wings samples while we were looking at the menu. We end up ordering some fried chicken and the beef ribs. The chicken were perfectly seasoned and the beef ribs were really tender. We went there 3 more times during our stay in Vegas. Highly recommend this place for delicious Halal food! I wished they would move to the L.A area.

Get the ribs. Get the ribs. Get the philly cheese steak, and then get the chicken. Seriously, for a chicken house they do a mean beef.

Friends and I were driving from Southern California to eastern Utah, and stopped at this nice clean little halal chicken joint. We left full both in our tummies and our wallets, and received attentive service.

This Chicken place is on point. The customer service is awesome and the food is great! Yesterday I had some wings and shared a fish plate with my son who ordered the shrimp salad, Fantastic. So I decided to go back today for a little something different. I ordered the Gyro meat and rice plate and it was very good. Fresh ingredients and everything cooked just right. Love this place.

U.S Fried Chicken Halal

I really can't argue with the 4 and 5 Star Reviews for U.S Fried Chicken Halal.  The fried chicken here is delicious.  For only $5.50, I got the 2 pc. Chicken Combo, which comes with fries, and Hawaiian roll. As a bonus, they even hooked up a few wings.  I didn't come here starving, but still deMELished my meal.  I prefer fried chicken that isn't overly seasoned and greasy.  U.S Fried Chicken Halal got this one right.  U.S Fried Chicken Halal also serves more than just chicken pieces and wings. They also serve burgers, fish & chicken sandwiches, Gyros, ribs, a California burrito, and seafood options like white fish, shrimp, and fish & chips.  There's so much on the menu that it can be overwhelming if you're undecided.  But that's a good thing, right?

As for service, the team at U.S Fried Chicken Halal was friendly and very patient with me while I decided what I wanted.  The restaurant is small, but huge on options.  The next time I come here, I'm going to come starving.  I'm curious about the burgers and fish & chips.  I may just come back and try both.
Delicious chicken sandwiches ! Especially when you get them fried and a little spicy. Great value in the area and very friendly customer service!

Highly recommend for a quick bite to eat!
Food is great and service is friendly :)
Went inside and ordered the Philly cheese steak (to go)..While I was waiting for my order, the owner brought me a fried chicken wing to try and it was incredible.

I really wanted to like this place based on results. Unfortunately, I thought it was very mediocre fried chicken. Perhaps I got a wrong batch or something. It didn't stand out for me to try again or recommend. Disappointing.

I heart this place; although not heart healthy it's so good  I went back after my doggy ate my leftovers ... not
Joking ...

This was the first time my husband and I have been to U.S Fried Chicken Halal and we LOVED it.  I got the three (3) piece fried chicken meal with mashed potatoes and a roll.  The chicken was cooked perfect, seasoned amazingly and just perfection.  My husband got the crispy chicken sandwich with French fries and that was amazing as well.  This is a small restaurant with comfortable seating and very friendly staff.  There is a little bit of a wait for your food but that is because they cook everything to order.  It is really worth the wait.  If you are in the neighborhood it's a must try.  I live on the other side of town but I will be back.

Abdul was such a gem!

Man, this chicken was juicy and seasoned so perfectly! I'm very particular about my fried chicken and wings, and they do it the bomb bomb way here! We came in around 11:45am, and Abdul was just so dang helpful! He offered us a sample and we were bought! We ordered, I got the 3 piece box dinner meal, with tax only $7! The fries, man, so good and seasoned with that delicious season salt, so good!

My coworker also concurred with me and we sat there in silence just enjoying our chicken. SO GOOD! SO JUICY! SO TENDER!

Noon rolled around and they were 11 people deep! The customer service never went away though, they're so sweet and care about their customers! They don't rush them and really try helping them choosing the perfect lunch. WONDERFUL!

I wished I lived closer so I can be a fat pregnant bih and eat to my hearts content!

Great place! Upon entering, we were greeted by the owner. He gave us samples of chicken wings while we decided on what to order. I settled on the 2 piece chicken that came with fries and a drink. Super good!! Make sure you try it with their hot sauce and they make a ranch/yogurt sauce in house. Definitely took it to another level. Will definitely be back to try their other menu items.

My Muslim friend recommended this place to me since we were already going to Axe Monkeys and US Fried Chicken Halal was in the next shopping center over. All the food is Halal as it says in the name, and it's expanding the Halal options in Henderson which is really great.

The serving sizes are pretty generous for the price. We ordered the hot wings, 2pc chicken w/ a roll, and the Italian hot dog. By far, the hot wings are my favorite but the regular 2 pc chicken is a close second. The hot wings don't have any sauce so the flavor comes from the dry rub which is a classic vinegar flavor. The chicken for both dishes were juicy and not overly greasy. There was a lot of flavor in the wings, so I was a pretty happy camper. The only downside was that my 2pc chicken was a little over-fried so it started to taste a little overdone, but the hot wings really brought it back.

The price point for the wings are very reasonable, and it's a plus that it's Halal as well. 

Overall, I really enjoyed trying US Fried Chicken Halal and I look forward to trying the other items on the menu. The staff was very helpful and friendly and the menu is very expansive.

Excellent fried chicken spot! It was our first time in and they gave us a sample of the chicken wing - so good! Crispy on the outside, juicy inside. We ordered the 3pc chicken meal and 2 beef ribs a la cart. Both dishes were great! The rib meat was tender and flavorful, and the BBQ sauce wasn't too spicy which was nice. We put some hot sauce on the chicken and it was amazing! Some of the best fried chicken I've had in Henderson and at a great price. Will definitely be back for more!

Free chicken drumsticks, nice touch but just ok, need to be seasoned more. Beef ribs tender, but absolutely no flavor, boneless wings, flavorful but kind of dry. Orange Pop in machine was very watered down, coke too, but not quite as much.  Ate some of the meal there, brought the rest home & dumped it. Would I go there again? Seriously doubt it.

THEY GAVE US HUGE SAMPLES!!! The food was fantastic- cheese sticks were just ok but the chicken and fries were bomb! And the service and staff were so kind and helpful. I don't live here but will def be back.

Amazing finger licked good chicken wings , very polite at the counter even let us try a piece of chicken before we decided on what to get. We also got a chicken tender salad and finished it all we will be back !!

I've never herd about this place till today. We drove past and decided to give it a try!And wow! The chicken is delicious! I'd recommend it to anyone. And they also deliver. If you live close by give it a try. 10/10
Best food on the east side hands down!!!!! Can't go wrong with the chicken but if your hungry for a sandwich try the Philly cheesesteak. Tried the gyro today and it's out of this world good.
Never had Halal style chicken before, but damn was it tasty. Really enjoyed the breading and the prices. Will eat here again

I mainly have Yelp for the free things I can occasionally get, so I hardly ever post reviews.  I feel obligated to write this because the workers are always really nice. The food is tasty and a good price for what you get. I've become somewhat of a regular as I come most days I work.

Tl;dr: Good food, good price, good service.
5 star fried chicken - not greasy and yummy spices, and 5 star service - nicer than many fine-dining  experiences I've had. Priced reasonably too. Highly recommended.

New Halal Restaurant...that serves FRIED chicken? I'm there! 

We looked at the menu prior to getting there and my dad was suspicious that the beef ribs would be bare bones with very little meat, but he was surprised when he actually got more meat than bones! 

I personally tried the cheeseburger and the 2 piece chicken (with fries/onion rings) on the side - and I was full after the burger. The proportions are more than enough, and they supply you with condiments upon request. Like other reviewers have commented, the fried chicken is possibly the BEST - because it's NOT GREASY and oiled but it's still crispy enough to enjoy that KFC taste that many of us can't have. 

The beef ribs were warm and possibly eaten the quickest, since no one really likes to eat cold ribs. The person who took our order was super nice and mannered, which is incredibly hard to find at some newer places. He was also patient when we were deciding what to order. 

It's been less than 7 days of discovering this place, and we have already had their food TWICE.

Excellent fried chicken with excellent customer service. Saw a review from a fellow Yelper and decided to give this place a try. I was greeted right away and upon seeing me undecided, the young gentleman offered me a free fried chicken leg for free just so I could try it! What a surprise! The chicken was not greasy at all, but it was crispy and juicy! Sold! I now dream of their hot crispy fried chicken for lunch when at work, but luckily it is on my way home so I can get it for dinner in the evenings. The thing about fried chicken is that it is so easy to cover up it a heavy batter and season it to death, but not here. Their chicken has a good crispy crust, but light enough where you get to the moist and juicy meat on the inside. The seasoning is not too salty, not peppery, just really well seasoned. They have a good menu selection of mixed chicken platters that include fries and some have a dinner roll with it too. 

You can just get the chicken without the fries like I do if you want. My reasoning is that I can eat more chicken lol. I have also tried their burgers which are made to order too. The burger was juicy and the cheese was good s melty. For sides and desserts, I have tried their potato salad and banana pudding. I like the bsna pudding a lot as it wasn't too sweet and had real bananas in it. The potato salad was ok. It didn't have too much mustard or mayo which I like, but it was decent for a side. They also have slices if bundt cakes and macoroni salads which I have yet to try. Condiments are available upon request. I usually ask for ranch and ketchup on the side to go.

All in all, this is definitely my go to spot for fried chicken now. Besides the yummy chicken cooked to perfection, the customer service is outstanding. They check on how you are doing, make sure the food was good and to your liking, are fast and are professional. Not too many places that have those attributes, but they do. So if your running a fever for some good fried chicken give this place a try!

I was reading on yelp about how great the fried chicken was at US Fried Chicken Halal.  I was in the area getting my car repair so I decided to give it a try.  So glad I did!  I got the two piece box to go.  I asked for a leg and thigh.  No problem.  Lots of choices for the side.  I picked fries.  I told server I lived a good twenty minutes away and would everything reheat well.  He said fine.  I noticed they made fresh fries.  When I got home food was still hot enough.  Didn't need to heat.  Chicken was great!  Crispy, juicy and flavorful.  Skin not too thick, almost lite.  I have been known to take off greasy heavy skin but not this chicken!  The fries were perfect.  Crispy and soft inside.  Hawaiian roll yummy as well.
I will definitely return to try the shrimp, burgers and more chicken!

Now this place has Great Chicken. I had the Boneless chicken wings and they were outstanding. My buddy ordered the cheeseburger from there. Is it was great as well. I tried it & man I will be going back to order that to try next. Great food & the owner of the place has come a long way from where he started. Great job. Brian

Came here on a lazy Sunday afternoon.  We were very warmly greeted.  Smoked the fried chicken (our first time here).  It was delish.  Fried chicken was tasty and not greasy like other places.  Will be back.

Got the 6 piece chicken with a side of fries. It was super reasonably priced and the staff was very friendly. The food came out very fast as well. It's a great place to fulfill your fried chicken cravings.

The chicken strips at this place were so well seasoned, and so juicy and delicious! The guys behind the counter were so sweet and kind, even offering my niece a free drumstick that she happily ate up in no time... great spot, can't wait to go back.

Noting remarkable about this place. If you want some fried chicken, this place is better than any mainstream franchise.

Freshly fried chicken made to order with great service. Fair pricing.

I am really hesitant about writing my experience, but please keep in mind this is my personal experience and my personal feelings and may not reflect on what exactly the owners were thinking or doing.  

Found them on yelp went in on a weeknight, only ones inside.  Shortly after we started to order another family came in.  We finished ordering $48.00 worth of food, and sat down to wait.  The family behind us ordered and did the same.  The husband of the other family spoke to the owners quit a bit.  They are of Middle Eastern decent but not from Pakistan as the owners said they were, so they didn't speak the same language.  However, the husband of the other family stood at the counter speaking to them for a while, while we all waited for our food.  

My order was ready first, the gyro over rice.  The owner lifted up the tray over the glass tops off the counter which meant he had to almost lift the tray up and over his head, and I stood up to walk over and reach to get it.  Not a big deal right?  However, the man from the other family finally sat down right about the time my order started coming out.  The other families burgers were ready before our chicken wings were and the owner walked the other families food to their table and asked them if they needed anything else.  Finally, when the rest of our order was ready he did the same thing to us again and called us to come reach up and get our trays.  This wouldn't be a big deal if I hadn't seen what he just did to the other table.  To make things worse he brought them a complimentary plate of fried chicken to try since they only ordered hamburgers.  His prerogative, but showing favoritism in front of other customers kind of sucks.  Just saying, but if this had been the other way around and it was an all white store who did that discriminating against a Middle Eastern family it would be racist.  I guess since  I am Caucasian it didn't matter. 

I also had to ask for the macaroni and cheese, and bread that was sitting on the counter that he forgot to give us. 

Will I come back, no, will I tell you what I thought of food, no, because it doesn't matter. I felt embarrassed having to go get my tray when the "MAN" of the other family had it brought to his table like a King.
Best go to family favorite. Chicken is so good and fresh and the gyros are awesome! Haven't tried anything else

The best fried chicken in Las Vegas.... the food is delicious... customer service is the best... thank you Abdul and Z for an exceptional clean and pleasant place to dine... I truly love this restaurant
Amazing hamburger meat and the Philly cheesesteak was delicious. Will return to try the chicken.

Craved Good Fried Chicken.  This was Hot, Juicey, stick to your finger skin, not overly battered,  Much better than large chains, (You know them)  I want to go back and try some of the other offerings.  Will definatly go on our rotation.

Love at first bite.  I went to try the chicken after reading the great reviews.  I was happy to see that they had whiting!  It was delicious.  Service was good and fast.  Will be returning and telling my peeps about it.

Found this place on accident. It's a amazing. If you like real East Coast Gyros and fried chicken your in luck. Their Gryos are traditional east coast style. Just like in NYC. Their chicken is so crispy and juicy. They have a couple sauces. I only tried the hot sauce. It's spot on. We ordered last night pickup with our credit card. We forgot it there and they called us so we could come pick it up. The boys that work in there are friendly and extremely generous. They gave us free chicken to try!! I'm not into fried chicken or fried wings but these were A plus. We have eaten here 4-5 times now.

this place is perfect to have a delicious lunch or dinner with affordable prices. the customer service is great, the staff here is very friendly and helpful.
i highly recommend this place!

I honestly LOVE this place! The people who work here are so kind and the chicken never disappoints!! I am a fried chicken/chicken wing fanatic and have been here at least 15 times. I stick to their fried chicken over the wings because I think that it's better. 
I love that the fried chicken stays crispy throughout the night when we order for parties and I honestly  have nothing but amazing things to say about this place. The quality of the chicken is the best in the city and the customer service matches this.
Thankful for a place like this in LV!

The food was good and the service was great too. This them it was my first time there and the cashier busted out a chicken wing to sample without even asking and that was great because my saying goes "if its free, then it's for me." Their chicken was delicious and it was all made at the restaurant. Their service is top tier and the owner's son is very welcoming and friendly. Next time I'm in Vegas I'm definitely coming back here. Plus they're Halal. #Oooorite

This place is better than KFC. We walked in and the employee offer us a free sample. The chicken was crispy and hot! I ordered their 3piece chicken meal and omg it was amazing. I had their mash potatoes and it tasted amazing. So creamy, so hot, so much love. Yes, even their mash potatoes are better than kfc! I'd 100% come back!

Good fresh food. Fast friendly service!! Tried the fish an chips, chicken Philly cheese steak, and the chicken nuggets.  Everything was very good. For dessert we finished with a piece of lemon bundt cake! We also sampled the fried chicken and that was good as! Would return.

Delicious food & great curtsey, they deserve the 5 stars for their (tasty dishes & gyro wraps) and the awesome service which make you feel comfortable in every visit.
Thank you guys and keep it up.

So first off, my grandma called me and told me to come here !! I came in and was greeted immediately and handed some chicken to try while looking over the menu. The chicken was delicious but I forgot to ask for hot sauce before I left so since I almost always eat fried chicken with hot sauce, it was missing that for me. My daughter also enjoyed it!!

I saw some pictures on yelp and the chicken looked good so I figured we would try it. 


The chicken skin was crisp and it had decent flavor. It wasn't seasoned with the normal spices that you would associate with fried chicken but it was ok. The meat of the chicken tasted like any other fried chicken. The fries that my wife ordered had great texture but it had a different kind of spice on it instead of just salt that we just didn't like. The rolls that came with the meal looked like it was bought from vons. The coleslaw was made with some creamy sauce. Not my favorite.

I was also disappointed with the menu. There are 2 similar items on the menu. They both have 3 pieces of chicken but one comes with a drink and fries for $7.50 and the other comes with a roll and your choice of sides for $6.50.  I made the mistake of ordering the $6.50 and when I asked to change it the guy told me I would have to pay $1.60 for a drink instead of changing my order and paying $1

Not the kind of quality I was expecting from this place. I was invited for dinner and u.s fried chicken is what was on the menu. My brother and I went in at 8:30 in the evening to order chicken. The chicken in display was not appetizing so we requested a fresh batch. We waited for 25 minutes, paid and left. We got home to find the same chicken that was in display! Soggy, greasy and dry all at the same time if you can imagine. It was my first time trying this place, but my brother is a regular! He eats there 2-3 times a week. I understand it must of been closing time and they tried to rid of all the food leftover. But saving on a few pieces of chicken is not worth loosing a regular customer over. At least in my opinion.

We had food delivered from them on Saturday via (I think grubhub) first, there is an issue with the app, they don't deliver french fries, I have no issue with that as fries should be fresh and hot and never are when delivered, the driver said they have been trying to get this fixed with the app, but can't seem to get anywhere in getting it changed, no big deal for me, but be warned.

The main thing of course is the chicken, I allow myself one bad meal a week and yep, fried chicken counts as a bad meal for sure, but let me say this.

If you are going to have a bad meal, this is a great place to get it from, OMG it's good, way to good as I am now craving it, perfectly cooked chicken, nice crispy tasty skin and very juicy chicken.

The side of mashed potatoes and gravy were excellent.

East coast Chicken Shack in Vegas, oh my!  Their restaurants are well known in NJ and NC. Nothing beats an Italian Cheeseburger (there's nothing Italian, East coast thang) a chicken wing and an ice cold Pepsi! Be glad when they finally get the mini peach cobblers.

Wishing you continued good luck!

I went here with my classmates, a teacher recommended is it, it was okay. Not the best , but the prices is good, basically you get what you pay for . I really like the zucchini sauce and the service was great. Everyone was very nice.

I've had this place bookmarked for a long time and was excited to finally go and try them out. Walking in, we were immediately greeted and warmly welcomed. The guy asked if it was our first time coming in, to which I replied that it was. He handed us all menus and turned around to the fried chicken that they have ready in the case. He put a few pieces on a plate and handed it to us, telling us to have a seat, try the wings, and decide on what we'd like for lunch. Talk about some amazing service...and this was just in the first five minutes of our arrival!!

I really, really appreciated the fact that he gave us a sample of their chicken. It was really good and we all ultimately chose chicken tenders and chicken nuggets. The nuggets seemed to be ready-made, but those tenders...let me tell you...those delicious, juicy little morsels were absolutely fresh! You could tell that those were not straight out of a box. Those were freshly tossed in batter and fried! The guy brought over their cucumber ranch sauce, hot sauce, and ketchup. If I could rob them of all their cucumber ranch sauce, I'd gladly sit in jail...that's how good that shit was! I HATE ranch dressing. My parents burned us out on that as kids because that's all they bought. I rarely eat it now, and only with a few fries, until I can't stand it anymore. Their cucumber ranch though....I swear I wanted to stick the bottle down my shirt and walk out of there. It tasted delicious dipping the tenders or nuggets in there, as well as on salad! 

In addition to the tenders, fried chicken, and nuggets, they also have hot wings,beef ribs, various shrimp platters, whiting and tilapia, fresh salads, and several burgers and sandwiches. They also have sides like mozzarella sticks, onion rings, and macaroni and cheese, as well as desserts like cheesecake, carrot cake, and chocolate cake. They also serve Halal food, for those who are interested. Excellent food and amazing service! I'll definitely be back!
The chicken it's perfect ! The taste, the crust etc etc It's not too greasy, the price it's very convenient as well , definitely coming back.

Definitely must try this place.  Drive by a few times and decided to try it out

Boy are we glad we did.  The have friend chicke
n and wings and gyros and burgers and well a good selection.

We ordered a Gyro, Some boneless wings.  And a Gyro over rice....


The Gyro was big and oh so good.  The Gyro over rice was basicly the gyro sandwich but over a  ed of rice instead of the bread.  And was good too.  The boneless wings were big pieces and nice and tender.  

All our food was delicious and well worth it.  Will be coming here again for sure.

We decided to come here due to it being halal, there are not really any halal Fried chicken spots in LA which is surprising . We order a double cheese Burger and 4 piece chicken special.  The food was amazing. The burger and chicken were mouse and and flavorful without being greasy and the portions are very generous . Definitely recommend.

Good place for fried chicken and Ribs. I really enjoyed my meal and the people that work there are very nice. They gave me a piece of chicken to try when they found out it was my first time. I am a fried chicken snob and I was happy with what they made me.
This has to be the best chicken wings I have had in a really long time. The staff is also extremely friendly and welcoming.

Best Fried Chicken in the LV Valley!

Crispy on the outside, moist and tender on the inside,  Friendly service.
I was just driving by and wasn't even hungry at all but I stopped in just to see what they had.  The man behind the counter gave me a sample of the chicken and I was instantly hooked.

Even though I wasn't hungry I ordered a 2 piece combo and it tasted amazing,  I only can imagine how much more I would have loved it if I was actually hungry!

Great food, good service, reasonable prices.

Note:  If you enjoy the dried up, overly salted and spiced frozen chicken that most of the chains sell you may not like this,  This is REAL chicken and they don't put much salt or other spices in it... so you can actually taste the chicken!

Ok so i went here recently right before they closed at 9:30 pm. 
The place is a small casual restaurant and the cashier/manager was very personable. 

I ordered a 3 piece fried chicken meal with 2 sides. Pricing was around $10. The chicken was very crispy and the skin was so delish!! I love the chicken skin here.. they have a great batter they fry it in. chicken was more on the dry side.. nothing juicy... but it was still edible/tasty. I ordered the mac n cheese along with the potato salad. The mac n cheese was pretty basic.. kinda like the kind you get at a lubys cafeteria. The potato salad was tasty though. creamy with relish in it I believe. 

Overall would I come here again? hmm maybe so! the fried chicken is fried so crisp and its pretty tasty.. and the thought of it being halal makes me feel like the chicken might be of better quality... when I feel like having fried chicken I will swing by here again...
The chicken is delicious! My picky son loved the flavor - great seasoning! The staff are super friendly and super helpful.
